actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act establishing the Indian Dunes National Lakeshore to provide for the expansion of the lakeshore and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the expansion of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore. Increases the membership of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act establishing the Indian Dunes National Lakeshore to provide for the expansion of the lakeshore and for other purposes.
